response.original_title: Strength and Honour: Cycling Canada Coast to Coast
response.overview: What could a person gain by cycling across Canada?  The cyclists on this trek know nothing about cycling. It is clear from the start that a lot of learning will take place throughout the seven-week journey this summer. The elements of wind, sun, spandex and road construction tame the wildest spirits on the team. Everyone has a wall to go through, but how badly does each one want to smash through it. Does the fear of what lies on the other side prevent someone from finishing the trip?
response.title: Strength and Honour: Cycling Canada Coast to Coast
